# Government Tender Announcement: Mountain Training, Accommodations, and Advisory Services

## Request for Standing Offer (RFSO)

The Department of National Defence (DND) invites service providers to submit a Request for Standing Offer (RFSO) for mountain training, accommodations, and advisory services.

### Background

This bid solicitation supersedes the previous solicitation number W6399-24LO24/A dated December 28, 2023, with a closing date of February 5, 2024. A debriefing or feedback session will be provided upon request to bidders who submitted proposals on the previous solicitation.

### Scope of Work

The successful service provider will provide mountain training, accommodations, and advisory services to the DND on an "if and when" requested basis over a period of three (3) firm years with two (2) additional one-year option periods. The delivery point will be the service provider's facility.

### Requirements

To be eligible, bidders must provide the required information as detailed in article 2.3 of Part 2 of the bid solicitation, in order to comply with Treasury Board policies and directives on contracts awarded to former public servants. A preference for Canadian goods and services will be given.

### Important Dates

- Publication date: June 12, 2024
- Tender closing date: July 19, 2024, at 2:00 PM EST
- Amendment date: July 19, 2024
- Expected contract start date: None
- Expected contract end date: None

### Contact Information

For any inquiries, please contact:

Christopher Muldoon
